amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2692 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2692 proposed by Senator Sasse for Senator Markey. (consideration: CR S7508-7509; text: CR S7508-7509) In the nature of a substitute.
Referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2692 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
